metadata.dc:author: Ibáñez-Tarín, C
Manzanera-Escartí, R
metadata.dc:description: Cognitive behavioural therapy has shown to be very effective for treating the vast majority of mental health disorders. We comment on those techniques that can be easily used in the Primary Care setting.
metadata.dc:title: Técnicas cognitivo-conductuales de fácil aplicación en atención primaria (I).
[Easily implemented cognitive behaviour techniques in Primary Care (part 1)].
